dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 382 IH: Pandemic is Over Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Guthrie (for himself, Mrs. Rodgers of Washington, Mr. Burgess, Mr. Latta, Mr. Griffith, Mr. Bucshon, Mr. Dunn of Florida, Mr. Bilirakis, Mr. Carter of Georgia, Mr. Joyce of Pennsylvania, Mr. Hudson, Mr. Curtis, Mr. Crenshaw, Mr. Duncan, and Mr. Pence) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To terminate the public health emergency declared with respect to COVID–19.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Pandemic is Over Act.

section.header: Termination of COVID–19 public health emergency
section.text: The public health emergency declared by the Secretary pursuant to section 319 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 247d) on January 31, 2020, entitled Determination that a Public Health Emergency Exists Nationwide as the Result of the 2019 Novel Coronavirus (and any renewal thereof) shall terminate on the date of the enactment of this Act.
